game.actor
Class PopUpBehavior

java.lang.Object
  game.actor.PopUpBehavior
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameComponent, Pausable
public class PopUpBehavior
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameComponent, Pausable

Makes an Actor pop up, then hide itself after a short time

Author:
John Casson

Constructor Summary
PopUpBehavior(Actor actor)
          Creates a new PopUpBehavior that controls the passed Actor.
 
Method Summary
 void hit()
          When the actor is hit, hide the actor then show it again after a delay
 void onPause()
          Pauses the behavior by saving the pause time.
 void onUnPause()
          Unpauses the behavior by updating the next show and next hide times to reflect the time we spent paused.
 void play()
          Repeatedly shows and hides the Actor
 void showDelayed()
          Shows the actor after a delay
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

PopUpBehavior

public PopUpBehavior(Actor actor)
Creates a new PopUpBehavior that controls the passed Actor. Sets the next show time to be at least a second after creation.

Method Detail

hit

public void hit()
When the actor is hit, hide the actor then show it again after a delay

showDelayed

public void showDelayed()
Shows the actor after a delay

Repeatedly shows and hides the Actor

public void onUnPause()
Unpauses the behavior by updating the next show and next hide times to reflect the time we spent paused.
